fullText: Laura Linney gives a performance of such intimate grace and controlled emotion that she makes Strout's sometimes overly precious prose feel like the most natural thing in the world.
dtliExcerpt: Laura Linney gives a performance of such intimate grace and controlled emotion that she makes Strout's sometimes overly precious prose feel like the most natural thing in the world.
